pub trait LedgerConnection: Send + Sync {
    fn get_public_key<'life0, 'async_trait>(
        &'life0 self,
        account_id: u16
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<[u8; 32]>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;

        &'life0 self,
        account: u16,
        wallet: u16,
        message: &'life1 [u8]
    ) -> Pin<Box<dyn Future<Output = Result<[u8; 64]>> + Send + 'async_trait>>
    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,
        'life1: 'async_trait,
        Self: 'async_trait;

        &'life0 self,
        account: u16,
        wallet: u16,
        message: &'life1 [u8],

    where
        'life0: 'async_trait,

        Self: 'async_trait;
}
